Usually for breakfast I make some oatmeal and a smoothie.
For oatmeal: Soy milk, Oats, Cinnamon, and Vanilla Extract. But you can change it up a bit. Sometimes I put bananas or berries in it.
For the Smoothie I just kinda add whatever I have in it. Mostly strawberries and Blueberries and other Fruits I feel like that day.
You can also make pancakes by blending the oats and adding some Soy milk to it which is pretty good.
